Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.7 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 6.2 with a standard deviation 2.8. The z-score of the person with 10.7 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.03
* 1.6
* 1.61

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.03: Incorrect
* 1.6: Incorrect
* 1.61: Correct
